remarks:
Define maps-to notation for defining an operation via a rule.  Read as "the operation defined by the map from ` x , y ` (in ` A X. B ` ) to ` C ( x , y ) ` ."  An extension of ~ df-mpt for two arguments. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2008.) 

---

 Define maps-to notation for defining an operation via a rule.  Read as "the operation defined by the map from ` x , y ` (in ` A X. B ` ) to ` B ( x , y ) ` ."  An extension of ~ df-mpt for two arguments. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2008.)
statement:
df-mpt2 $p |- ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ z = C ) } $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
$d C z $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
